llm_command:
bash
kubectl patch networkpolicy cartservice-policy -n cartservice --type=json -p='[{"op": "add", "path": "/spec/egress", "value": [{"to": [{"podSelector": {"matchLabels": {"app": "redis"}}}], "ports": [{"port": 6379, "protocol": "TCP"}]}]}]'
